## 1.1 A simple example of random effects


```{r}
library(nlme)
head(Rail)
class(Rail)
plot(Rail)
```


$$
y_{ij} = \beta + \epsilon_{ij},\\
i = 1, ..., M, \\
j = 1, ..., n_{i}, (1.1)

```{r}
fm1Rail.lm <- lm(travel ~ 1, data = Rail)

```
